title: Connection to MSSQL
author: aurubis
body_snippet:

In version 1.77.1 the following error occurs:

_Connection file could not be saved as ""!
The specified ColumnMapping does not match any column in the source or destination._

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: Nightly Build 1.77.3 does not save the configuration of the software, therefore a restart requires you to recreate the configuration file. A new nightly build should be on it's way though, see #2345. This has the configuration saving enabled again :)
